Elements.Text: Microsoft Dynamics 365, Dynamics 365, business applications, what is dynamics 365

Elements.Name: metadescription
Elements.Text: Learn how to be more agile with Dynamics 365, the only portfolio of intelligent business applications that empowers everyone to adapt and innovate.

Title: Stay agile. Do more with less.

Elements.Name: img
Elements.Alt: Stay agile. Do more with less.

Elements.Name: h1
Elements.Text: Stay agile. Do more with less.

Elements.Name: p
Elements.Text: Drive more efficiency, reduce costs, and create a hyperconnected business that links people, data, and processes across your organization—enabling every team to quickly adapt and innovate.

Elements.Name: p
Elements.Text: Introducing AIM—move to the cloud with confidence and boost productivity with rapid AI adoption.

Elements.Name: p
Elements.Text: See how sales and marketing teams use AI to lighten their load and get more time back in their workdays.

Title: Solutions that fit you. Not the other way around.

Elements.Name: h2
Elements.Text: Solutions that fit you. Not the other way around.

Elements.Name: p
Elements.Text: Choose one, some, or all. Dynamics 365 applications are made to work together—and with your existing systems—for a comprehensive solution that connects your entire business. So you connect with every customer.

Elements.Text: Drive more revenue by connecting sales and marketing

Elements.Text: Get increased visibility into customer needs.

Elements.Text: Lead customers down the pipeline faster and close more deals.

Elements.Name: p
Elements.Text: Read how the manufacturing supplier modernized its service operations and increased revenue using Field Service.

Elements.Name: p
Elements.Text: Tillamook County Creamery Association improved warehouse pallet throughput by over 50 percent while also automating key manual processes using Dynamics 365.

Elements.Name: img
Elements.Alt: person discussing by pointing to laptop

Elements.Name: p
Elements.Text: SHI Cryogenics reduced product repair turnaround times from two months to two weeks, while also growing sales and service profits using Dynamics 365.

Elements.Name: img
Elements.Alt: Group of people together with happy faces

Elements.Name: p
Elements.Text: MVP Healthcare transitioned to Dynamics 365 and expects $6 million in savings by implementing AI-driven process improvements, sunsetting legacy domains, and improving IT efficiency.

Title: Trusted by global businesses big and small
